meta.title: Design Lab
meta.description: Go from cool idea to insanely great product

hero.heading: Go from cool idea to insanely great product
hero.text: Our Humble Team is ready to help you create great products with a focus on what really matters: users, investors, and revenue.

ing.heading: ING. Portal for small & medium businesses
ing.text: Helping to invent a new business direction for the biggest Dutch bank.

nasa.heading: NASA. A new way to manage space in space
nasa.text: A spaceship storage and cargo management tool designed to make the launch preparation more efficient.

qatar.heading: Qatar ministry of foreign affairs
qatar.text: The official app for Qatar citizens traveling abroad.

erste.heading: Erste group & Deloitte Digital
erste.text: Concept and ideation for security tokenization mobile application.

serpbook.heading: Serpbook
serpbook.text: Comprehensive product development for the leading SEO rank tracker.

cogni.heading: Cogni
cogni.text: Re-thinking modern banking both visually and conceptually with one of the most ambitious New-York fintech start-ups.

ottomatic.heading: Ottomatic
ottomatic.text: A b2b database backup tool with automatization features and smart analytics.

jti.heading: JTI employees portal
jti.text: Streamlined sales, seamless onboarding and a brand new knowledge base: everything to keep this tobacco leader ahead in the race.

creddible.heading: Creddible
creddible.text: A service that helps decrypting the complexity of a credit score and takes the advice on its improvement to the next level with the bite-sized actions for the end consumer.

truebill.heading: Truebill
truebill.text: Subscription and bills management that also helps to optimize and save.

devBlock.heading: Go from cool idea to insanely great product
devBlock.text: You can read about our core mission, i.e. making complex websites & web applications, on the relevant page
